channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenStack Foundation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenStack Foundation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-15139|2024-08-05T19:50:16.404Z -- openstack%20foundation -- openstack-cinder
item.description: A vulnerability was found in openstack-cinder releases up to and including Queens, allowing newly created volumes in certain storage volume configurations to contain previous data. It specifically affects ScaleIO volumes using thin volumes and zero padding. This could lead to leakage of sensitive information between tenants.
